title: Polo Sport Ralph Lauren Leather Hiker Boots Brown Tan Strap Lug Sole Men's 13D
hook: Two-tone Polo Sport hikers with a tough lug sole and signature strap detail—built like a little tank, styled like a 90s/Y2K mood.
description:
Rugged Polo Sport by Ralph Lauren leather hikers in a clean brown/tan two-tone with a signature strap across the laces. Details include a padded collar, metal eyelets, rubber toe/bumper, and a chunky lug outsole with plenty of bite. Great for casual wear, streetwear/utility looks, or light outdoor use.

Size: Men’s 13D (see size tag). Leather upper. Made in China.

Era note: Polo Sport pieces like this are most commonly late-90s to early-2000s; exact year isn’t printed on the boot.
included_items: 1 pair of boots only (no original box).
